testcase.classname: E-commerce Project Web Site Health Check
testcase.name: Open Browser and Navigate
testcase.system-out: Given User Opened the Browser...............................................passed When User navigated to the app url..........................................passed Then User is able to see application landing page...........................passed

testcase.name: User is able to see the product details
testcase.system-out: Given User searched for the product.........................................passed When User click on any product..............................................passed Then User is navigated to the new tab and product details are displayed.....passed

testcase.name: User is able to select the quantity and add to cart from Product details page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the product details page...................................passed When User selects the product quantity as 2.................................passed And User clicks add to cart on the page on product details page.............passed Then Product is added to the cart...........................................passed
